original_text: You will be sorry and ashamed that you did such wicked things. Your sisters will be happy that their punishment was less than yours.
korean_text: 네가 네 수욕을 담당하고 네가 행한 모든 일로 말미암아 부끄럽게 하리니 이는 네가 그들에게 위로가 됨이라

sentences.original_text: that you did such wicked things
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 그런 악한 행동을 했다는 사실에

sentences.original_text: that their punishment was less than yours
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 벌이 당신의 것보다 가볍다는 사실에
